```{r}
#load packages ------------------------------

library(tidyverse)

# function---------------------------------

temperature_converter <- function(temp_C) {
  fahrenheit <- temp_C*(9/5) + 32
  return(fahrenheit)
}

# test function
temperature_converter(temp_C = 0)

```
